page.title: 19Industries - Small
page.content: {Magnascan Mining }working the Upper Maes Melin seam, is the only open-cast mine and is on Wernddu Farm. The coal produced is Swansea Dry Steam, suitable for domestic central heating and other boilers. 8 men using large earth moving machines remove the overburden (land) off the coal with horizontal cuts and prepare the coal with an hydraulic excavator. There is no need to decontaminate the coal which is loaded onto lorries on site. The company with the Welsh Office Agricultural Dept. have a progressive restoration programme. There are 2 small timber industries. In Alltwen is a {woodwork {manufacturer }operating from a converted bakery and employing 5 craftsmen and operating 1 vehicle. {Pontardawe Timber }which employs 2 men supplies and delivers timber locally.
